description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ultimate survival training exercise. Explore and fight in a large open world with up to 15 of your friends. This last man standing paintball battle features 5 weapons and a large urban wasteland with a variety of tactical locations.
